Html:
Hi Radioman,

i just want to ask if you are using osm and would it be possible to do the same functionality on google maps for giving navigation directions. Second is it also possible to use downloaded country map extract from the OSM site to gmap.net? Thank you.

regards,
miks

direction for osm isn't implemented, dunno if they provide such service

it's possible only if you have a way to convert data to tiles
